title: Looking to buy/trade for Evers--updated cards available
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Looking to buy/trade for Evers--updated cards available
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for Johnny Evers cards. Looking for all issues from his playing career except for the few I already have.

Below is a link to some cards available for trade. Email [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Cards for trade or sale [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/forsaleortrade[/url]

If you have a trade or buy offer let me know.

Cards I do not need:

D304

E145-1

P2

Thanks
Mike

Was able to pick up a couple so far. Thanks for looking.
Mike
Updated the cards for sale or trade. Here is the link [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/forsaleortrade[/url]
